alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 05 at 7:57AM EDT until September 05 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Mill Creek at Evendale. * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. At 7:45 AM EDT Monday, the stage was 14.1 feet. The river is expected to rise to near 14.2 feet this morning. The river will fall below flood stage by this afternoon. * WHERE...Mill Creek at Evendale. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Flooding occurs near the Sharon and Mosteller Road intersection, as well as along Canal Road. Flood waters begin to enter some businesses near the creek in Reading, Evendale and Sharonville. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
